array.name: CREATE_TABLE_SQL
array.item: CREATE TABLE collection (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,type INTEGER,imgsrc TEXT,title TEXT,time TEXT,typename TEXT,url TEXT,downloadurl TEXT)

array.name: QUERY_ALL_TABLE_SQL_ORDER_ID
array.item: select * from collection order by id desc

array.name: QUERY_ALL_TABLE_SQL_DESC
array.item: select * from collection order by time desc

array.name: QUERY_ALL_TABLE_SQL_WHERE_TYPE_BY_ID
array.item: select * from collection where type=? order by id desc

array.name: QUERY_ALL_TABLE_SQL_WHERE_TYPE_BY_DATE
array.item: select * from collection where type=? order by time desc
